verses.text: ‘EIKI, ‘oua te ke valoki au ‘i ho‘o ‘ita, Pea ‘oua te ke tautea au ‘i ho‘o fu‘u tuputāmaki na.
‘Ofa mai, ‘Eiki, he Kuo u vaivai: Sihova, faito‘o mai; he ‘oku ngatata hoku ngaahi hui.
‘Oku mātu‘aki tākatu‘u foki ‘eku mo‘ui ē: Ka ko koe, ‘Eiki, ‘afē?
Foki mai, ‘Eiki, ‘o hamusi ‘eku mo‘ui: Fakamo‘ui au koe‘uhi ko ho‘o anga faka‘atu‘i.
He tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘i ai ha manatu kiate koe ‘i he mate: Ko hai ‘e fai ‘i Hētesi ha fakafeta‘i kiate koe?
‘Oku ou ongosia ‘i he‘eku tauto‘e: Ko hoku mohenga ‘oku tētē ‘i he pō kotoa pē: ‘Oku ngaunu hoku tokoto‘anga ‘i hoku lo‘imata.
‘Oku ‘osi‘osi hoku fo‘i mata ‘i he hoha‘a: ‘Oku mātu‘aki luku ia ‘I he ngāue ‘a hoku fu‘u kau fakatanga.
Hiki meiate au, ‘a e kau faikovi: He kuo ongo‘i ‘e Sihova ‘a e le‘o ‘o ‘eku tangi.
Kuo ongo‘i ‘e Sihova ‘eku hū; ‘E tali ‘e Sihova ‘eku lotu.
‘E mā hoku ngaahi fili fua pē, ‘o nau mātu‘aki hoha‘a: Te nau foki atu, pea ‘iloange te nau mā.
